code: import axios from"axios";import{appConstants}from"../constants/constant";export var emailUs=function emailUs(eu,success,failure){var emailUsPromise=axios.post("".concat(appConstants.API,"/emailUss"),eu).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.EMAIL_US,payload:emailUsPromise};};export var putEmailUs=function putEmailUs(eu){var getEmailUsPromise=axios.put("".concat(appConstants.API,"/emailUss"),eu);return{type:appConstants.PUT_EMAIL_US,payload:getEmailUsPromise};};export var getEmailUs=function getEmailUs(){var getEmailUsPromise=axios.get("".concat(appConstants.API,"/emailUss/notReplied"),{withCredentials:true});return{type:appConstants.GET_EMAIL_US,payload:getEmailUsPromise};};
